# LIDAC maps
```{r  include=FALSE}

  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  fig.pos = "H",
  out.width = "100%",
  dpi = 300
)


knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
```

